name: @marioslab/ulang
description: Virtual machine & assembler for recreational programming like it's 1992.

scripts.clean: rm -rf ulang-vm/dist && rm ulang-vm/src/ulang.* && rm -rf ulang-site/assets/js rm -rf ulang-site/assets/js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:modules && npm run build:wasm npm && run build:ulang-vm && npm run build:ulang-site
scripts.build:modules: npx tsc -b -clean && npx tsc -b && cp ulang-vm/src/ulang.js ulang-vm/dist
scripts.dev: npm run build:wasm && concurrently "npx live-server --no-browser" "npm run dev:wasm" "npm run dev:ulang-vm" "npm run dev:ulang-site"

author: Mario Zechner
